title: Andrew Sheets: As 2020 Begins, Investors Get Optimistic
description: On today's episode, Skepticism was the prevailing investor attitude for most of 2019, but what a difference a quarter can make. So what changed? Chief Cross-Asset Strategist Andrew Sheets talks changing sentiment as 2020 kicks off.
itunes:title: Andrew Sheets: As 2020 Begins, Investors Get Optimistic
